estimatedUsage.description: Estimated 1 GB storage for typical function app

Standard_LRS.notes: Costs include storage capacity and transaction costs

basic.name: Application Insights

dataIngestion.description: First 5 GB/month free, then $2.30 per GB

estimatedUsage.description: Estimated data ingestion for function app logs

basic.notes: Costs vary based on log volume and retention settings

estimationNotes: Prices are based on Azure public pricing as of November 2025
Actual costs may vary based on usage patterns, region, and promotional offers
Consumption (Y1) plans have variable costs based on executions and resource usage
Premium (EP) plans have fixed monthly costs plus any additional instance costs
Storage costs include both capacity and transaction costs
Application Insights costs are based on data ingestion volume
All prices are in USD and represent monthly estimates
